A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is the worst Star Wars film ever. This is not a blind or paid review. I don't know how much money did Disney spend to receive a massive positive reactions to the movie when clearly is the worst piece of s**t SW movie ever.

No character development\, easy and lazy storytelling\, terrible and lazy writing\, bad soundtrack\, bad CGI\, horrible dialogue and script\, stupid jokes... Disney has ripped off the heart of this franchise and turned it into a Marvel-like empty shell action movie.

STAR WARS IS DEAD!
